    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Separation of crude oil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trennung des Rohöls</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Séparation de pétrole brut</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Separação do óleo cru</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Separazione di petrolio greggio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χωρισμός του ακατέργαστου πετρελαίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Separación del petróleo crudo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that crude oil is split up into fuel and raw materials for making new substances.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crude oil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fuel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Raw materials</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Separation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Rohöl oben in 
Kraftstoff und in Rohstoffe für das Bilden der neuen Substanzen 
aufgespaltet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que le pétrole brut 
est fractionné dans le carburant et les matières premières 
premières pour faire de nouvelles substances.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o óleo cru está 
rachado acima no combustível e em materiais crus para fazer 
substâncias novas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che il petrolio 
greggio è scisso in combustibile ed in materie prime per fare le 
nuove sostanze.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το ακατέργαστο 
πετρέλαιο είναι χωρισμένο στα καύσιμα και τις πρώτες ύλες για 
την παραγωγή των νέων ουσιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el petróleo crudo 
está dividido en el combustible y las materias primas para hacer 
sustancias nuevas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rohöl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraftstoff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
